Text:
I hope all will give this upload a chance and check it out and please give feedback on the comments, Thanks

Vulcan
I hope to find an all english version soon and will post that as well if I find it soon enough.
Downloading now, just watched the sample and its pretty good. I'd give the sample 7/10a/v

Thanks for the input, I did what I could with it and hope it works well when you get the whole thing, I tried to sync the audio a little better than the version I got it from, I am currently working on bringing the audio from this one to another Chinese version of it I got that has a little better video, but its audio goes in and out of Chinese, unless people think this one is good enough. I am going to keep working on ripping the audio from this one to use on the other one, and re-encoding it with the Subtitles I made, I don't know yet if I am going to compress it down to a smaller size yet, I want to see how it turns out with the complete audio transfer, also working on cleaning up the audio a little more too.
Forgot to say this, let me know how it plays when you get the whole video, again thanks.
It plays well Vulcan, thanks very much! :)

You are welcome my friend, keep seeding and all others that like it, keep seeding and let me know how it is, thanks to all who help seed this.

Vulcan
Trying to find a decent copy of this, this is probably the worst one I've tried so far. Echoes and laughter in the audio, pixelated video.

@ Xandror

I am working on a better one with better video, and so far most all I have found has audience laughter in it, they are cam rips, not DVD rips, one can only clean up so much when encoding and re-encoding, but I am working on a better viewable copy now, but it takes time to encode videos and to hard code the subtitles.
course you won't find a freakin dvd copy!! it JUST came out yesterday ya jackhole!!

Almost have the better version ready, it is better on the visual and I tried to clean up the audio a little more, and working on the subtitles, when done i will upload and hope all like it better, also anyone need custom subs made for their movies in any particular language, get with me and I wil make the subs for you as well. And thanks to all who helped to seed this for me, I hope the next version, you will like better.
